User.name: John Doe
User.symptoms: I have a rash on my penis

diagnoses.name: Prearuptal Rash or Genital Herpes
diagnoses.explanation: A preuptal rash or genital herpes can be caused by an STI, often appearing as a red, itchy, or painful rash on the genital area. This condition can be caused by herpes simplex virus (HSV) or other STIs.
causes: Exposure to HSV or other STIs
potential_treatments: Topical creams for itching and inflammation
recommendations: Avoid scratching or irritation of the affected area
diagnoses.next_steps: Visit a healthcare provider for a proper diagnosis and treatment plan

message: A message to the user that their information has been processed and a ticket has been created.
summary: Based on your symptoms, we strongly recommend that you visit a healthcare provider for a proper diagnosis and treatment plan. Practice safe sex, get tested for STIs, and avoid scratching or irritation of the affected area. Keep in mind that this is not a substitute for professional medical advice. You will be assigned a virtual health assistant to support you throughout your care.
